content.question: The function f is continuous and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mn>8</mn> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>u</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>u</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>6</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@460A@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. What is the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msubsup> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>?</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A6C@</annotation> </semantics> </math>
